name: TARDIS Blue - Tumblr Dashboard Theme
description:
Subtly changes your Tumblr dashboard to the comforting tones of the TARDIS.

Tumblr is almost there with its color scheme, but not quite right, so I thought I'd change that. The main background color used is the BBC-approved TARDIS Blue: http://imaginaryworld.net/3308/bbc-approved-tardis-blue/
obsoletion_message: Fixed dodgy image URL as recommend by userstyles.org admin
additional_info:
Provided as-is. If something's missing or blatantly broken then get in touch - see 100yen.co.uk for my contact details.

TARDIS is a trademark of the BBC. I'm claiming no affiliation with them, and I'm hoping that use of the term TARDIS on this theme is considered fair-use. I just wanted to give something neat to Doctor Who fans on Tumblr, because there's a lot of them!
